H0.text: What type of animal can be found on a tin of 'Lyle's Golden Syrup'. Bear

H1.text: What type of animal can be found on a tin of 'Lyle's Golden Syrup'. Bee

H2.text: What type of animal can be found on a tin of 'Lyle's Golden Syrup'. Horse

H3.text: What type of animal can be found on a tin of 'Lyle's Golden Syrup'. LiOn

A4.text: The tin bears a picture of the rotting carcass of a lion with a swarm of bees.
